1.task: Reading is not just a hobby; it’s a way to open new doors to knowledge and ideas. Studies have shown that reading frequently can enhance cognitive function and even delay the onset of demntia. Moreover, it expands your vocabulary and helps you articulate your thoughts more effectively. Whether it’s fiction, non-fiction, or poetry, books allow you to explore different perspectives and develop a deeper understanding of the world. Take time to read every day!

6.task: Would you like to improve your fitness level while having fun? Joining a group fitness class might be just what you need! 9.task: Planning your dream holiday can feel overwhelming, but it’s also an exciting experience. Start by choosing a destination that suits your interests, whether it’s a relaxing beach or a cultural city tour. Then, create an itinerary that balances sightseeing with time to rest. Don’t forget to book your accomodation and activities in advance to avoid last-minute stress. With some careful planning, your next holiday will be a wonderful adventure full of unforgettable memories.

12.task: Do you love exploring nature? Hiking might be the perfect hobby for you! It’s a great way to stay active, enjoy fresh air, and experience beautiful landscapes.
